profile.title: Profile

hero.title: Everything you want. Really.
hero.subtitle: Oflem is not a list of categories. Describe your task and we will find the right Provider.

how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.description: Three simple steps to turn your tasks into free time or extra income.
how_it_works.step1_desc: Describe your mission in a few words, set your price or ask for quotes.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Receive offers from certified Providers and choose the right one.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Pay securely via the platform, once the mission is completed and validated.

guarantees.title: What Oflem ensures
guarantees.secure_payment_desc: Mission paid after completion, funds held in escrow.
guarantees.full_rewards_desc: Providers receive the full price agreed upon.
guarantees.swiss_quality_desc: A platform built by help-seekers for help-seekers.

You don't have to validate the mission. Funds remain held and our mediation team intervenes within 24 working hours to find a solution.

No, Oflem is open to all motivated indiv: No, Oflem is open to all motivated individuals and professionals. For technical tasks, we simply verify your diplomas or insurance.
